# UpdateTeamSourcesRequest

**Properties**

| Name              | Type      | Required | Description                                  |
| :---------------- | :-------- | :------- | :------------------------------------------- |
| sources_to_add    | List[int] | ❌       | Ids of sources to add to the perimeter.      |
| sources_to_remove | List[int] | ❌       | Ids of sources to remove from the perimeter. |
